casebody.data:
In the Matter of Maurice DANIEL, Appellant,
v.
BROOKLYN LAW SCHOOL, Respondent. 2018-18 Court of Appeals of New York. March 27, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal denied.

Motion for ancillary relief dismissed upon the ground that this Court does not *325have jurisdiction to entertain it (see NY Const, art VI, § 3 ).
